title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe that there is a change in allele frequency.
The response describes that there is a change in allele frequency.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not identify any of the following as the independent variable.

· Growth rate of the bacteria

· Density of the bacteria
The response identifies one of the following as the independent variable.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not predict that only the Cit + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39AC@ bacteria grew.

The response predicts that only the Cit + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39AC@ bacteria grew.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not provide the reasoning that the Cit + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39AC@ bacteria have an energy source unavailable to other strains and could grow and reproduce at a more rapid rate due to reduced competition for resources.

The response provides the reasoning that the Cit + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39AC@ bacteria have an energy source unavailable to other strains and could grow and reproduce at a more rapid rate due to reduced competition for resources.
